pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel N4100 (similar) or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system. Disk Space may vary.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 series or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system. Disk Space may vary.
